text: The Hotwives of Orlando is an American sitcom. It premiered on July 15, 2014. It was made available only for Hulu. The show was developed by Paramount Digital Entertainment. It is a parody of The Real Housewives comedy series on Bravo. The show has only one season so far. The show is about several fictional women who live in Orlando, Florida. The first season focuses on Tawny St. John (portrayed by Casey Wilson), Shauna Maducci (Danielle Schneider), Phe Phe Reed (Tymberlee Hill), Veronica Von Vandervon (Andrea Savage), Crystal Simmons (Angela Kinsey), and Amanda Simmons (Kristen Schaal). ==Cast== * Casey Wilson as Tawny St. John: "The Trophy Wife" * Danielle Schneider as Shauna Maducci: "The Bankrupt Overspender" * Tymberlee Hill as Phenomenon "Phe Phe" Reed: "The Entrepreneur" * Andrea Savage as Veronica Von Vandervon: "The Cougar" * Angela Kinsey as Crystal Simmons: "The Religious Zealot" * Kristen Schaal as Amanda Simmons: "The Drug Addled Former Child Star" ===Supporting and recurring cast=== * Paul Scheer as Matty Green * Joey McIntyre as Heath * Stephen Tobolowsky as Phil * Matt Besser as Anthony * Jerry Minor as Rodney * Seth Morris as T.J. * Dannah Phirman as Alli * Sterling Knight as Billy * Jeff Hiller as Antoine Other guest appearances in the first season include "Weird Al" Yankovic, Kate Walsh, Rich Fulcher, Melissa Rauch, Kulap Vilaysack, Lauren Lapkus, and Horatio Sanz. ==Episodes== No. in series Title Directed by Written by Release date == Other websites == * * * Category:2010s American television series Category:2014 American television series debuts Category:American sitcoms Category:Orlando, Florida Category:Television series set in Florida Category:English-language television programs Category:Hulu original series
title: The Hotwives of Orlando
